resources.string: South Cotabato is a province of the Philippines located in the SOCCSKSARGEN region in Mindanao. Its capital is Koronadal City, and it borders Sultan Kudarat to the north and west, Sarangani to the south and east, and Davao del Sur to the east. To the southeast lies Sarangani Bay.

Greenleaf Hotel is the only 4-star hotel in General Santos and is the most elegant hotel in Mindanao. By embodying Western comfort and Filipino hospitality, they give the best of both worlds. They offer the most conducive working environment in Gensan with their business center where clients can stay connected with seamlessly fast Internet. Their grand ballrooms and multi-function rooms are the ultimate venues for conventions and personal events.

Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms to ensure a restful night. Entertain the hotel\'s recreational facilities, including fitness center, indoor pool, massage, pool (kids).

Lake Sebu is one of the Philippines\' most important watersheds and a major provider of irrigation to the provinces of Sultan Kudarat and South Cotabato. It is located in the ancestral domain of the T\'boli and Ubo tribes. The DOT has promoted the lake as one of the prime eco-tourism destinations in Mindanao.

Deep in the hinterlands of South Cotabato, where the ethnic tribe of the T’boli people resides, sits a place filled with wonder and surreal beauty. The uncharted terrains, marred by certain ruggedness, have been trekked by adventure-seekers who are in search of new places to marvel at. There, nestled at the crater of Mt. Parker, is Lake Holon, whose clear waters and surrounding green pastures bring forth a feeling of peace and tranquility to every visitor who dared to climb its trails.

SM City General Santos is located on the highly urbanized center of South Cotabato province. Situated on a 6 hectare corner lot along Santiago and San Miguel streets in downtown area. It features a total floor area of 125,245 sqm with three (3) levels of mall with cinema, foodcourt and five (5) floors parking building.

Koronadal Commercial Center (KCC) started in 1947 as a textile store in Koronadal City. It was the time when Koronadal was on its rapid commercialisation and became the capital of South Cotabato. It then expanded in 1989 as a supermarket and department store and branded as KCC Shopping Center.

The Roman Empire Boutique and Wellness Hotel is a brand new Theme Hotel, inspired by the old Romans. It offers a huge 50 meter long Swimming pool with its own Island, a direct access to the pool from all Cesar Superior Rooms, a unique roman garden area with a fountain, a state of the art Dancing music fountain, a roman style restaurant and huge bar.

Situated in Panglao, 3 km from Alona Beach, Ecostay Panglao Resort Hotel features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms provide pool view and come with a desk and free WiFi.

The Chocolate Hills are a geological formation in the Bohol province of the Philippines. There are at least 1,260 hills but there may be as many as 1,776 hills spread over an area of more than 50 square kilometres. They are covered in green grass that turns brown during the dry season, hence the name.

The Tarsier Sanctuary is a large forest dedicated to the protection of tarsiers, small nocturnal primates with big, round eyes that feed primarily on insects. They usually cling to low branches or the trunks of slim trees.

Island City Mall is the largest shopping center in Tagbilaran city. Located opposite to Dao Public Market and Dao Intergrated Bus Terminal. Island City Mall has redefined the concept of shopping, dining, and entertainment in Bohol upon its opening in 2004. It infused lifestyle changes in the community, brought shopping into one roof, made available diverse dining options, and became an energetic events venue where people can linger and enjoy various entertainments and live performances.

Solea Mactan Resort features a large salt-water outdoor infinity pool with water slides. It also features a fitness center, games room, a restaurant and private beach area. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

Palm Grass Hotel, the only heritage hotel in Cebu, offers a unique approach to hospitality. It doesn\'t simply provide guests with a bed and a place to stay, but it brings them Cebu\'s history and culture. The seven-storey green hotel gives you the blueprint of Cebu\'s revolutionary history in the Spanish period - a unique blend of experience as we travel back in time when our heroes offered their lives for the freedom that is being enjoyed today.
Magellans Cross is a Christian cross planted by Portuguese and Spanish explorers as ordered by Ferdinand Magellan upon arriving in Cebu in the Philippines on 16 or 17 March 1521

Fuerte de San Pedro is a military defense structure in Cebu, built by the Spanish under the command of Miguel López de Legazpi, first governor of the Captaincy General of the Philippines. It is located in the area now called Plaza Indepedencia, in the pier area of the city.

SM City Cebu, also known locally as SM Cebu or sometimes SM Mabolo, is a large shopping mall located in Cebu City, Philippines. It is the 4th shopping mall owned and developed by SM Prime Holdings, the country\'s largest shopping mall owner and developer.

Ayala Center Cebu is a large shopping mall owned by Ayala Malls at the Cebu Business Park in Cebu City, Philippines. It is the first Ayala mall located outside of Metro Manila. It opened in November 1994, one year after their rival mall, SM City Cebu opened.

Double M Hotel is a new brand of business hotel in Mindanao that caters to travelers looking for great accommodations and dining experience in a safe and secure destination, complemented with exceptional service from well-trained staff. Envisioned to highlight the beauty and emerging transformation of Mindanao, Double M Hotel is a premier choice for quality and value.

Hotel Valencia is a great choice for accommodation when visiting Valencia (Bukidnon). The city center is merely 0.2 km away and the airport can be reached within minutes. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city\'s must-see destinations. At Hotel Valencia, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. The hotel offers access to a vast array of services, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, car park.

When you passes by the City of Pines in Malaybalay City, it is a must to see the well manicured landscaped of this monastery being maintained and sustained by the monks. They have Abbey Cafe almost next to the church,with a souvenirs and goodies to take home.

The “Blue Water Cave” is a natural tourist attraction hidden in the lush valley of a river that flows underground in the connecting caverns of the San Jose village here. “The color of the river water is blue all year round,” The cave\'s opening is small. At the bottom, cool and clear water accumulated.

Robinsons Place Valencia is a three level full-service shopping mall located in Valencia City, Bukidnon. Opened last December 12, 2018, the mall is the first national brand mall in the province of Bukidnon, the fifty first Robinsons mall in the country and the seventh Robinsons mall in Mindanao.
Unipace Corporation, a shopping mall chain in Mindanao, operator of Gaisano City Mall in Cagayan de Oro, Gaisano Iligan, Gaisano Malaybalay, Gaisano Valencia and Gaisano Butuan.

Jaimees Hotel is a modern beach front resort conveniently located just 10 minutes drive from the Southern Leyte capital Maasin City. The Hotel is highly regarded for our excellent food (which is all freshly prepared to order), our personal service and excellent facilities. Recent expansions of the hotel have seen the development of a new separate state-of-the-art function facility which can hold events for over 200 people.

Caimito Beach Hotel is the newest luxury Hotel in Maasin, Southern Leyte. It is situated 6km from the centre of Maasin City on the highway going towards Padre Burgos. Opened in June 2013, the meticulous attention to detail, and the quality of materials will be obvious to any discerning guest. All family rooms, double rooms, and twin rooms have either a private balcony or patio overlooking the infinity pool and ocean.

Its a protected aquatic reserve fringed by mangroves that also serve as a sanctuary for wild ducks. Puy-aw Islet punctuates the vast turquoise swathed seascape. It is decked with a watchtower for coastal patrols but it is also used as picnic gazebo for visitors.

Agas agas bridge is tallest bridge in the Philippines. In there, you can have a roadtrip and feel the air of the environment. You can also stopby, and take pictures of how high the bridge built was. With great mounstains surrounding.

Gaisano Capital is a chain of malls and supermarkets owned by Edmund S. Gaisano Sr., the second son of Henry S. Gaisano Sr. In the 1970s, he had his own construction business independent of his relatives.

Our hotel is centrally located in the heart of Sorsogon City making it convenient to walk to all major city landmarks and serve as your jumping point to all the tourist spots in Sorsogon Province. We are next to the newly opened City Mall opposite the City Park and a 10min-walk to Sorsogon Baywalk Rompeolas, 24-hr convenience stores, restaurants and markets. The Donsol Whale Shark Experience, Bulusan Volcano, Bacon Beach, Rizal Beach, Palogtoc Cold Springs, Hot Springs of Irosin, Paguiriran Island and Barcelona town are all around an hour’s driving distance. -Fernandos Hotel

Paopao Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms in Sorsogon. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, each room includes a patio with a sea view. At Paopao Hotel every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The church present facade, walls and bell tower are original ones. Its walls are made of coral rocks and its windows are built high and wide. It is said that no cement or steel were used in the construction of the church. Instead, beaten egg whites and a local wine mixed with lime were used as adhesives. The church interiors however have been renovated and glass and steel windows have been incorporated.

Lake Bulusan is a lake on Luzon Island in the Philippines. It lies at the heart of Bulusan Volcano National Park which covers a land area of 3,672 hectares. It has an elevation of 360 metres and is located on the southeast flank of Mount Bulusan, an active volcano.

CityMall Commercial Centers, Inc. is a subsidiary of DoubleDragon Properties. It owns a chain of community shopping malls, with branches across the Philippines. First CityMall to open in the Bicol Region
